parameters.name: SpaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace. You can call the [GetLhSpaceByName](~~424379~~) operation to obtain the workspace ID.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.

parameters.name: UserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user. You can call the [ListUsers](~~141938~~) or [GetUser](~~147098~~) operation to obtain the user ID.
